metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.title: W3Schools.com

metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.

content.text: NPM packages in the broad JavaScript ecosystem doesn't always have types available.
content.html: NPM packages in the broad JavaScript ecosystem doesn't always have types available.

content.text: Sometimes the projects are no longer maintained, and other times they aren't interested in, agree with, or have time to use TypeScript.
content.html: Sometimes the projects are no longer maintained, and other times they aren't interested in, agree with, or have time to use TypeScript.

content.text: Using non-typed NPM packages in TypeScript
Using untyped NPM packages with TypeScript will not be type safe due to lack of types.
content.html: Using untyped NPM packages with TypeScript will not be type safe due to lack of types.

content.text: To help TypeScript developers use such packages, there is a community maintained project called Definitely Typed .
content.html: To help TypeScript developers use such packages, there is a community maintained project called Definitely Typed.

content.text: Definitely Typed is a project that provides a central repository of TypeScript definitions for NPM packages which do not have types.
content.html: Definitely Typed is a project that provides a central repository of TypeScript definitions for NPM packages which do not have types.

content.code_html: npm install --save-dev @types/jquery

content.text: No other steps are usually needed to use the types after installing the declaration package, TypeScript will automatically pick up the types when using the package itself.
content.html: No other steps are usually needed to use the types after installing the declaration package, TypeScript will automatically pick up the types when using the package itself.

content.text: Editors such as Visual Studio Code will often suggest installing packages like these when types are missing.
content.html: Editors such as Visual Studio Code will often suggest installing packages like these when types are missing.
